result.execSummary:
The defendant Mathew J Zins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to County Jail (<10 Days), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
- $243 Court Costs. Payable through Clerk of Court in 60 days.
- $200 DNA Sample and Surcharge. Payable through Clerk of Court in 60 days.

- May be served over 1 weekend from Friday at 4:30 PM through Monday at 8:00 AM.
- To commence no later than 4:30 PM on 5/27/22.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mathew J Zins

records.addlTxt: ec: attys, email: jail, c: SCSO, DE via mail.  gll

03:09 PM CO: Vlack, DAR: Gross, Clerk: K Kittel.   ADA:  Brian Thomas Smestad   DF ATTY:  Jens Hubert Loberg   DF:  Mathew J Zins appeared.   Court notes amended information filed today.  Atty Smestad notes the information amended Ct 1 to Misdemeanor Failure to Report to Jail. The State is seeking 5 additional days of jail, DE has served his time on the underlying matter. Atty Loberg files plea questionnaire. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands and pleads Guilty to amended Ct 1 (Misd Failure to Report to Jail) Court questions Defendant.  Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty to the amended Ct 1.  Sentencing arguments. Court responds and Clerk provides copy of letter to Attys by DE asking to extend report date that was denied. Attys respond. DE makes statements. Clerk: Lindabaur at 3:21 PM. All other appearances as previously stated. Court questions Defendant.

Court Orders:   
5 days jail
- may be served over 1 weekend 4:30 PM Friday through 8 AM Monday
- to commence no later than 4:30 PM on 5/27/22
- Court Costs: $243    60 DTP
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $200
